element.definition: Identifier for the data life-cycle stage for the participant object.
element.comments: This can be used to provide an audit trail for data, over time, as it passes through the system.
element.requirements: Institutional policies for privacy and security may optionally fall under different accountability rules based on data life cycle. This provides a differentiating value for those cases.

binding.description: Identifier for the data life-cycle stage for the object.
